articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Coronavirus: This could be the best way to disinfect and reuse N95 masks - Times of India
articles.description: Scientists have come up with a new way of disinfecting and prolonging the use of masks right now, which could be a big breakthrough.
articles.content: Masks are considered to be an essential accessory right now. While any kind of face-covering could garner some level of protection from the harmful COVID causing virus, N95 masks, experts suggest are… [+700 chars]
